properties.Descriptio:
Demarcate the boundaries - around the water source

Plant 10 no of Kumbuk trees around the water source

Supplying of Kumbuk seedlings [to be planted in 3.5m x 3.5m grid]

Supplying of NPK fertilizer [0.10kg/plant]

Ground preparation & maintenance [7 L/

properties.Observatio: It is exists as a water source and jungle
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving around the reservation Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and planting at 3.5m x 3.5 m grid interval
